allow:
Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/glassbox" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix calculation reference prefixes and add exponentiation support

- Fix entryMode reading: check group.entryMode before falling back to input mode
- Add lookup mode to modeIndices and prefix mapping \(L prefix\)
- Exclude lookup groups from main reference list \(rendered separately\)
- Fix selection indicator to only show when explicitly selected
- Add ^ to ** conversion for exponentiation in formula evaluation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/glassbox" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing DashboardContext for calculations page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/glassbox" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dashboard layout and navigation components

EOF

Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/glassbox" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix prerendering error by providing fallback context state

Instead of throwing when context is missing during SSR/prerendering,
return an empty state that components can handle gracefully.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/glassbox" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Force dynamic rendering and update data files

- Skip Vercel prerendering with force-dynamic export
- Update glass-inputs-autosave.json with latest state
- Add snapshot files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
